properties.name: list
properties.description: Array of draggable items. Items should be an object and each items should be the same type

subProperty.name: position
subProperty.description: Position of the item from the list

properties.name: headers
properties.description: Show the columns which has the same name with the list as key value. This includes title of each columns in the list, and includes width and textDirection

subProperty.name: key
subProperty.description: This is indicating what should be shown in the column

subProperty.name: title
subProperty.description: title of the column which is shown at the top of the draggable list

subProperty.name: width
subProperty.description: Width of the column in the list

subProperty.name: flexGrow
subProperty.description: If this value is true, row will be expanded to the remaining spaces

events.name: update:list
events.description: Event is emitted when you move the items into another position
